meanings.definition: Not sterile; not free from living microorganisms
meanings.sent1: The unsterile equipment could lead to infections.
meanings.sent2: The hospital took precautions to prevent unsterile conditions.
meanings.sent3: The unsterile lab mice threw a tiny party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an unsterile breeding ground for doubts.
meanings.sent5: The unsterile environment teemed with unseen dangers.

meanings.sent1: The unsterile kitchen needed a thorough cleaning.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the unsterile restroom at the gas station.
meanings.sent3: The unsterile cat left muddy paw prints all over the couch.
meanings.sent4: His unsterile thoughts tainted his perception of reality.
meanings.sent5: The unsterile water in the pond was murky and uninviting.
